ai.behavior:
when no enemy has effect -Surgical Eye- and 2 ability enemy use -Surgical Eye-
when use Move for ability -Surgical Eye-
when no enemy has effect -Disgusting Eye- and 2 ability enemy use -Disgusting Eye-
when use Move for ability -Surgical Eye-
when no enemy has effect -Evil Eye- and 2 ability enemy use -Evil Eye-
when use Move for ability -Surgical Eye-
when use Wait
when use -Evil Eye-
when use Move to weakest enemy
when use Defend
